mapper.select: SELECT idx , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY idx ) as seq , title , writer , content , DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as reg_date , view FROM notice LIMIT #{pageBlock} OFFSET #{pageOffset}
SELECT idx , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY idx ) as seq , title , writer , content , DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as reg_date , view FROM notice WHERE idx = #{idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(title, writer, content, reg_date, modif_date, `view`) VALUES(#{title}, #{writer}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW(), 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET view = view + 1 WHERE idx = #{idx}
